title: Enhancing Instructional Design Competencies: Improving Mathematical Problem-Solving Skills Through Online Case Analysis Discussions

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Students can systematically derive problem-solving strategies by analyzing and discussing real-world mathematical problems through case analysis discussions.
Students can compare various problem-solving approaches based on peer feedback and select optimal solutions.
Students can identify and correct mathematical errors raised during discussions.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
